TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ControlAdapter extends System.Object

summary.span: 自定义附加了适配器的派生控件的呈现，以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为，是所有控件适配器都可以继承的基类。

span.span: Customizes rendering for the derived control to which the adapter is attached, to modify the default markup or behavior for specific browsers, and is the base class from which all control adapters inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件适配器是组件，可以重写某些类中执行生命周期以允许浏览器或特定于标记的处理方法和事件。Control adapters are components that override certain class methods and events in its execution lifecycle to allow browser or markup-specific handling. .NET Framework 映射到的单个派生的控件适配器为每个客户端请求的对象。The .NET Framework maps a single derived control adapter to a object for each client request. 适配器修改特定浏览器或浏览器的类的控件，或作为针对某些功能的任意筛选器。An adapter modifies a control for a specific browser or class of browsers or acts as an arbitrary filter on some capability. 通常由浏览器使用 （例如，XHTML 或 HTML 3.2） 的标记语言定义适配器。Typically the adapter is defined by the markup language that the browser uses (for example, XHTML or HTML 3.2). 呈现行为的适应性很多可以封装在派生的专用类类。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the class. 因此，很可能一个适配器可以用于多种浏览器类行为，或者包括在适应性类可以使控件适配器的使用不必要。Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the classes could make the use of a control adapter unnecessary. 控件类的适配器适用于所有控件都继承自该类的除非存在更专业的适配器。An adapter for a control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present. 例如，对于适配器类可用于所有`Validator`对象。For example, an adapter for the class can be used for all `Validator` objects. 适配器通常不直接从继承类，但从一个特定于目标的适配器基类，后者可提供特定于控件类型和目标浏览器的其他功能或特定的呈现所需。Adapters typically do not inherit directly from the class, but from one of the target-specific adapter base classes that provide additional functionality specific to the control type and target browser or the particular rendering required. 控件本身并不一定需要适配器。Controls themselves do not necessarily require an adapter. 如果控件通过组合扩展，通常子控件适配器已足够。If controls are extended through composition, generally the child control adapters are sufficient. 每个控件具有通过.browser 定义文件的显式映射到适配器。Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files. 因此，任何访问属性使用从浏览器定义文件来查找到控件适配器的映射中提取的对象。Thus, any access to the property uses the object extracted from the browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control. 在处理期间，.NET Framework 截获对可能是特定于目标的一个控件的可重写方法的调用。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the overridable methods of a control that could be target-specific. 如果附加了控件适配器，.NET Framework 调用关联的适配器方法。If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 适配器通过控件执行呈现方法。The adapter performs rendering for the control through the method. 如果重写，则可能不应调用基类实现，它执行调用返回因为方法。If overridden, potentially should not call the base class implementation because that performs a call back on the method. 这可能会导致出现两次，一次由适配器和一次由该控件的呈现。This might cause the rendering to occur twice, once by the adapter and once by the control. 基于方法调用控件的方法。The base method calls back on the method of the control. 因此，如果重写，除非您实现的呈现之外，提供的不应调用基类实现的控件。Thus, if you override , you should not call the base class implementation unless the rendering you implement is in addition to that provided by of the control. 您必须确保.NET Framework 的子控件的适配器执行拦截。You must ensure that the .NET Framework performs interception for adapters of the child controls. 您可以执行此操作通过调用基方法，以便调用控件的方法从你重写。You can do this by calling the base method, which calls the method of the control, from your override. 并方法由该控件之前和之后 （分别） 的控件调用立即调用方法。The and methods are called by the control immediately before and after (respectively) the control calls the method. 如果前和后呈现唯一的浏览器特定处理任务，使用并可能会使用户无需重写。If pre- and post-rendering are the only browser-specific processing tasks required, using and might make it unnecessary to override . 默认行为并方法是调用的相应方法。The default behavior of the and methods is to call the corresponding methods of the . 若要维护其自己的状态信息，控件适配器可以重写， ， ，和方法。To maintain its own state information, a control adapter can override the , , , and methods. ， ，和当保存和加载，分别专用控件和视图状态时调用。, , , and are called when the private control and view states are saved and loaded, respectively. ， ， ，和基方法将调用回调的相应类方法。The , , , and base methods call back on the corresponding class methods. 因此，其中的任何将被重写的方法必须调用其基方法; 否则为该事件与类方法将不会引发。Thus, any of these methods that are overridden must call their base methods; otherwise, the event associated with the class method will not be raised. 控件和适配器可以选择实现和接口。Controls and adapters optionally implement the and interfaces. .NET Framework 确定适配器是否存在以及是否适配器实现这些接口。The .NET Framework determines whether an adapter exists and whether the adapter implements these interfaces. 如果是这样，适配器应重写， ，和方法，根据需要。If it does, the adapter should override the , , and methods, as necessary. 如果回发数据无法识别在适配器中，它必须返回调用控件以对其进行处理。If the postback data is not recognized in the adapter, it must call back on the control to process it. 后续的事件处理程序还必须调用返回在控件上。Subsequent event handlers also must call back on the control.

para.span: 继承自类，需要常规适配器功能的控件应具有相应的适配器基类，在模式中名为 (例如， )。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, a control that requires general adapter functionality should have a corresponding adapter base class, named in the pattern (for example, ).

para.span: 适配器应至少返回通过控件的强类型实例及其属性。

span.span: The adapter should at a minimum return a strongly-typed instance of the control through its property.

para.span: 对于给定的控件类型和标记语言应命名模式中控制适配器 (例如， )。

span.span: Control adapters for a given control type and markup language should be named in the pattern (for example, ).

para.span: 应在实现控件的适配器子命名空间。

span.span: Adapters for a control should be implemented in an subnamespace.

para.span: 控件适配器应继承自相应的基类，并遵循相同的继承模型为控件。

span.span: Control adapters should inherit from the appropriate base class and follow the same inheritance model as the control.

para.span: 例如，从继承的控件的适配器应该继承基类类或相关类。

span.span: For example, an adapter for a control inheriting from the base class should inherit from either the class or the relevant class.

para.span: 应为专用控件下的所有配置.browser 文件中的设备节点定义任何专用的适配器。

span.span: Any specialized adapters should be defined for the specialized control under all of the device nodes in configuration .browser files.

para.span: 正确实现的控件不应假定附加了适配器，或附加的适配器实现特定接口。

span.span: A properly implemented control should not assume that an adapter is attached, or that the attached adapter implements a specific interface.

para.span: 相反，它应检查这些之前调用。

span.span: Instead, it should check for these before calling.

para.span: 可以模拟重写受保护的事件方法在控件中，如方法的。

span.span: It is possible to simulate overriding protected event methods in the control, such as the method of the .

para.span: 首先，创建一种适配器类与OnClick方法。

span.span: First, create an adapter class with an OnClick method.

para.span: 然后，创建新的控件派生自并重写方法。

span.span: Then create a new control derived from and override the method.

para.span: 重写方法调用OnClick适配器的方法。

span.span: The overriden method calls the OnClick method of the adapter.

para.span: 该适配器对象是可通过受保护属性的类。

span.span: The adapter object is available through the protected property of the class.

para.span: 控件的属性是时没有任何关联的适配器，因此任何代码应检查该条件之前调用该适配器的方法。

span.span: The property of the control is when there is no associated adapter, so any code should check for that condition before calling methods of the adapter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建此适配器时它会创建相应对象。The .NET Framework internally constructs this adapter when it creates the corresponding object.

summary.span: 在呈现控件前调用。

span.span: Called prior to the rendering of a control.

summary.span: 在派生的 adapter 类中，生成特定目标需要但 HTML 浏览器不需要的开始标记。

span.span: In a derived adapter class, generates opening tags that are required by a specific target but not needed by HTML browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用方法方法，并且用于执行特定于目标的预处理在呈现控件之前。The method is called just before the method, and is used to perform target-specific preprocessing before the rendering of the control. 使用方法结合方法，以确保开始和结束标记的一致性。Use the method in combination with the method to ensure opening and closing tag consistency.

para.span: 继承自类，基类的方法调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，重写方法应调用基方法，仅当其处理为除此之外，而不是而不是，方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

summary.span: 获取对发出当前 HTTP 请求的客户端的浏览器功能的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the browser capabilities of the client making the current HTTP request.

value.span: 一个 ，指定客户端浏览器和标记功能。

span.span: An specifying client browser and markup capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象确定从客户端浏览器功能返回的对象属性。A object determines the client browser capabilities from the object that is returned by the property. 这使得对象来呈现特定于浏览器的标记或以其他方式修改的行为。This enables the object to render browser-specific markup or otherwise modify the behavior of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问请求的浏览器的详细信息。The following code example shows how to use the property to access the details of the requesting browser. 在此示例中，代码会检查以确定是否在浏览器适用于 JavaScript，然后允许开发人员在这种情况下呈现自定义的输出。In this example, the code checks to determine whether the browser is compatible with JavaScript, and then allows the developer to render customized output in that case. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/CPP/controladapter_browser.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/CS/controladapter_browser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/VB/controladapter_browser.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取对附加了此控件适配器的控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control to which this control adapter is attached.
The to which this is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当派生的控件适配器附加到控件时，.NET Framework 调用某些适配器成员而不是控件成员。When a derived control adapter is attached to a control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从自定义控件从类，然后创建继承自的相应适配器类。The following code example shows how to derive a custom control from the class, and then create a corresponding adapter that inherits from the class. 适配器重写属性，并返回控件的强类型引用。The adapter overrides the property and returns a strongly-typed reference to the control. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/CPP/controladapter.control.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/CS/controladapter.control.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/VB/controladapter.control.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自类，最小值，则应实现属性以返回该控件的强类型实例，如示例部分中所示。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, at a minimum, you should implement a property to return a strongly-typed instance of the control, as shown in the Example section.

summary.span: 为复合控件创建特定于目标的子控件。

span.span: Creates the target-specific child controls for a composite control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有派生的控件适配器附加到对象和重写方法，而不是调用该重写方法。If there is a derived control adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override is called instead of the method. 因此，可用于创建特定于目标的子控件集。Thus, can be used to create a target-specific child control set. 有关组合控件来创建新控件的详细信息，请参阅[复合控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb174677-d845-467c-8bf3-cc096b2490b0)。For more information about combining controls to create a new control, see [Composite Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb174677-d845-467c-8bf3-cc096b2490b0).

para.span: 如果创建继承的类并重写方法，则不要调用基方法，除非你想要将控件添加到所创建的基方法。

span.span: If you create an inheriting class and override the method, do not call the base method unless you want to add controls to those created by the base method.

para.span: 否则可以创建两个集的子控件。

span.span: Otherwise you could create two sets of child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 紧随其后调用方法方法，并且用于在呈现控件后执行特定于目标的后续处理。The method is called just after the method, and is used to perform target-specific postprocessing after the rendering of the control. 使用方法结合方法，以确保开始和结束标记的一致性。Use the method in combination with the method to ensure opening and closing tag consistency.

para.span: 继承自类，基类的方法调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，重写方法应调用基方法，仅当其处理为除此之外，而不是而不是，方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

summary.span: 加载适配器控件状态信息，该信息由 在以前请求与此控件适配器关联的控件所驻留的页时保存。

span.span: Loads adapter control state information that was saved by during a previous request to the page where the control associated with this control adapter resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是即使禁用了视图状态所需的基本状态信息。Control state is the essential state information needed even if view state is disabled. 当适配器需要维护其自己的控件状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own control state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器可能需要在有需要在请求中，独立于关联控件的状态之间维护状态的功能时保持控件状态信息。An adapter might need to maintain control state information when there are features that need to have state maintained across requests, independent from the state of the associated control. 例如，大型文本显示和一组组成的复合控件控件可能会呈现为台式计算机浏览器上的单一视图。For example, a composite control consisting of a large textual display and a group of controls might render as a single view on desktop computer browsers. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分其呈现的文本显示，另一个用于单选按钮组的一个视图。On other browsers, it might split its rendering - one view for the textual display and the other for the radio button group. 适配器需要维护其自己的特定于目标的信息有关当前处于活动状态的视图。The adapter would need to maintain its own target-specific information about the currently active view. 方法后立即调用方法，请在`LoadState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately after the method, in the `LoadState` lifecycle stage. 适配器控件状态是独立且除了该控件的控件状态。The adapter control state is separate and in addition to the control state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void LoadAdapterViewState (object state);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadAdapterViewState(object state) cil managed

abstract member LoadAdapterViewState : obj -> unit override this.LoadAdapterViewState : obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器视图的状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter view state information as a .

summary.span: 加载适配器视图状态信息，该信息由 在以前请求与此控件适配器关联的控件所驻留的页时保存。

span.span: Loads adapter view state information that was saved by during a previous request to the page where the control associated with this control adapter resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护其自己的视图状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own view state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器需要在请求中，独立于关联控件的视图状态之间必须保持的数据时维护视图状态信息。An adapter needs to maintain view state information when there is data that must be maintained across requests, independent from the view state of the associated control. 例如，在台式计算机浏览器上的网格控件可能会呈现为单个视图的行和列的值。For example, a grid control on desktop computer browsers might render as a single view of rows and columns of values. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分为多个单独的视图，如行和详细信息的单个行的列表及其呈现。On other browsers, it might split its rendering into multiple separate views, such as a list of rows and details of a single row. 适配器需要维护视图状态中不是当前处于活动状态的视图的数据。The adapter would need to maintain the data for the views that are not currently active in view state. 方法调用之前中的方法`LoadState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately before the method in the `LoadState` lifecycle stage. 适配器视图状态是独立且除了该控件的视图状态。The adapter view state is separate and in addition to the view state of the control.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 重写关联控件的 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有适配器连接到对象和重写方法，重写方法调用而不是方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 重写来执行特定于目标的处理中`Initialize`控件生命周期阶段。Override to perform target-specific processing in the `Initialize` stage of the control lifecycle. 通常情况下，它们是创建一个控件时，将执行的函数。Typically, these are functions that are performed when a control is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例都派生自定义控件适配器从类。The following code sample derives a custom control adapter from the class. 然后它将替代方法关联的控件上设置属性并调用基方法，以完成控件的初始化。It then overrides the method to set a property on the associated control and call the base method to complete the control initialization. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/CPP/controladapter_oninit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/CS/controladapter_oninit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/VB/controladapter_oninit.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自类，适配器并重写方法中，适配器必须调用相应的基类方法又调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果不会调用方法，不会引发事件。

span.span: If the method is not called, the event will not be raised.

summary.span: 重写关联控件的 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有适配器连接到对象和重写方法，重写方法调用而不是方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 重写方法来执行特定于目标的处理中`Load`控件生命周期阶段。Override the method to perform target-specific processing in the `Load` stage of the control lifecycle. 通常情况下，它们应为每个客户端请求执行的函数。Typically, these are functions that should be performed for each client request.

para.span: 继承自类，适配器并重写方法中，适配器必须调用相应的基类方法又调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果未调用不会引发事件。

span.span: If is not called, the event will not be raised.

span.span: A for the page where the control associated with the current is situated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供访问权限对象对象的关联与当前对象对象的权限。The property provides access to the object for the object where the object associated with the current object is situated. 属性可用于访问页面级别的适配器，如常见可应用到的页上的多个控件类型的特定于目标的函数的其他项。The property can be used to access other items at the page adapter level, such as common target-specific functions that could apply to several control types on the page.

param.name: writer
param.span: 用于呈现特定于目标的输出的 。

span.span: The to use to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 为附加了控件适配器的控件生成目标特定的标记。

span.span: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法来生成特定于目标的标记将发送到客户端浏览器。Override the method to generate target-specific markup to send to the client browser. 方法调用来代替方法如果对象附加到对象。The method is called in place of the method if a object is attached to a object.

para.span: 继承自类，基类的方法调用方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，重写方法应调用基方法，仅当其处理为除此之外，而不是而不是，方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

para.span: 对于复合控件，适配器开发人员必须确保呈现子控件。

span.span: For a composite control, the adapter developer must ensure that the child controls are rendered.

para.span: 如果方法使子控件呈现，但不会生成标记，它可能适合方法以调用其基方法。

span.span: If the method causes the child controls to be rendered but does not generate markup, it might be appropriate for the method to call its base method.

para.span: 如果子控件的特定于目标的呈现是必需的适配器应实现方法并调用方法从方法。

span.span: If target-specific rendering of the child controls is necessary, the adapter should implement the method and call the method from the method.

protected: virtual void RenderChildren(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 用于呈现特定于目标的输出的 。

span.span: The to use to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 为附加了控件适配器的复合控件中的子控件生成特定于目标的标记。

span.span: Generates the target-specific markup for the child controls in a composite control to which the control adapter is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法时需要此外到各个子控件的标记生成复合控件的子控件集的特定于目标的标记。Override the method when it is necessary to generate target-specific markup for the child control set of a composite control, in addition to the markup for the individual child controls.

para.span: 继承自类，用于复合控件，适配器开发人员必须确保呈现子控件。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, for a composite control, the adapter developer must ensure that the child controls are rendered.

para.span: 如果适配器重写方法，则应调用方法的重写从方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it should call the method from an override of the method.

para.span: 如果方法使子控件呈现，但本身不会生成标记，它可能适合方法来调用其基方法，调用方法，而不是实现的替代方法。

span.span: If the method causes the child controls to be rendered but itself does not generate markup, it might be appropriate for the method to call its base method, which calls the method, instead of implementing an override for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual object SaveAdapterControlState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveAdapterControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function SaveAdapterControlState () As Object
protected public: virtual System::Object ^ SaveAdapterControlState();
abstract member SaveAdapterControlState : unit -> obj override this.SaveAdapterControlState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存控件适配器的控件状态信息。

span.span: Saves control state information for the control adapter.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器的控件状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件状态是即使禁用了视图状态所需的基本状态信息。Control state is the essential state information needed even if view state is disabled. 当适配器需要维护其自己的控件状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own control state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器可能需要在有需要在请求中，独立于关联控件的状态之间维护状态的功能时保持控件状态信息。An adapter might need to maintain control state information when there are features that need to have state maintained across requests, independent from the state of the associated control. 例如，大型文本显示和一组组成的复合控件控件可能会呈现为台式计算机浏览器上的单一视图。For example, a composite control consisting of a large textual display and a group of controls might render as a single view on desktop computer browsers. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分其呈现的文本显示，另一个用于单选按钮组的一个视图。On other browsers, it might split its rendering - one view for the textual display and the other for the radio button group. 适配器需要维护其自己的特定于目标的信息有关当前处于活动状态的视图。The adapter would need to maintain its own target-specific information about the currently active view. 方法后立即调用中的方法`SaveState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately after the method in the `SaveState` lifecycle stage. 适配器控件状态是独立且除了该控件的控件状态。The adapter control state is separate and in addition to the control state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual object SaveAdapterViewState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveAdapterViewState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function SaveAdapterViewState () As Object
protected public: virtual System::Object ^ SaveAdapterViewState();
abstract member SaveAdapterViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveAdapterViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存控件适配器的视图状态信息。

span.span: Saves view state information for the control adapter.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含适配器视图的状态信息作为 。

span.span: An that contains the adapter view state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当适配器需要维护其自己的视图状态信息时，它会重写和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own view state information, it can override the and methods. 适配器需要在请求中，独立于控件的关联的视图状态之间必须保持的数据时维护视图状态信息。An adapter needs to maintain view state information when there is data that must be maintained across requests, independent from the associated view state of the control. 例如，在台式计算机浏览器上的网格控件可能会呈现为单个视图的行和列的值。For example, a grid control on desktop computer browsers might render as a single view of rows and columns of values. 在其他浏览器，它可能会拆分为多个单独的视图，如行和详细信息的单个行的列表及其呈现。On other browsers, it might split its rendering into multiple separate views, such as a list of rows and details of a single row. 适配器需要维护视图状态中不是当前处于活动状态的视图的数据。The adapter would need to maintain the data for the views that are not currently active in view state. 方法调用之前中的方法`SaveState`生命周期阶段。The method is called immediately before the method in the `SaveState` lifecycle stage. 适配器视图状态是独立且除了该控件的视图状态。The adapter view state is separate and in addition to the view state of the control.
